policies.title: Our Policies
policies.subtitle: Privacy & Data Usage
policies.p1: This application is for educational and demonstration purposes only. It is not intended for real financial transactions or advice.
policies.p2: All trading data, including your virtual balance and holdings, is stored exclusively in your browser's local storage. This data is not sent to any server and is private to your session.
policies.p3: If you provide a Google API Key for AI features, it is also stored only in your local environment and is used directly by your browser to communicate with the Google AI API. It is never transmitted to our servers.
